text:

Former Real Madrid and Brazil striker Ronaldo has shown off his slimmer figure and surprisingly good tennis skills in a new video. 
The 40-year-old, who previously guided Real Madrid to two La Liga titles and Brazil to two World Cups, has been out of the game for six years. 
Following his exit from football, Ronaldo proceeded to gain weight as he took full advantage of his free time. 
But as seen in the above footage, the Brazilian shows he's shed the pounds. Excellent form (Photo: AStv) 
And he also showed that his sporting talents extend further than football. Ronaldo demonstrates good technique and nimble footwork as he works his way around the tennis court. Heavy topspin with the grip (Photo: AStv)
